===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ねんごう}} compound {{m|zh|年號|tr=nen haw<sup>H</sup>|lit=year + call}}.  Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} reading ''niánhào'', {{etyl|yue|-}} ''nin<sup>4</sup> hou<sup>6</sup>''.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|ねんごう|acc=3|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ねんごう|kyu=年號|hhira=ねんがう}}

# An [[era]] [[name]], applied to periods from a few [[year]]s to several [[decade]]s. Used in former times in China and many other East Asian nations; now used only in Taiwan and Japan.

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|元号|げんごう}}
